channel.title: Joker Rage From Sadness - Otherside (Orchestral)
channel.description:
Prepare to take yourself to the dark yet colorful world of the character JOKER. Honestly after watching this movie i felt so connected with the character that it hooked me up from 2 weeks straight. That immense connection lead me to making up this track as a theme for the Joker. I tried to cover all the emotions and transformation of the character in the movie to this track. This track is my take on the character's love, innocence, darkness, emotions, anger. Hope you will like the track.
![1bb9bbccc6072b1e0d412cd2cf3dcc2b|600x400](upload://nzsjm8Jp8ngEdY9TGwFPm5TwPv.jpeg)
Soundcloud link
https://soundcloud.com/sushant-ghanekar/joker-rage-from-sadness
YouTube link https://youtu.be/ABmQnsTmIe4
